front.title: Experimental Message Types for Mobile IPv4

abstract.t: Mobile IPv4 message types range from 0 to 255. This document reserves a message type for use by an individual, company, or organization for experimental purpose, to evaluate enhancements to Mobile IPv4 messages before formal standards proposal. Also, Mobile IP defines a general Extension mechanism to allow optional information to be carried by Mobile IP control messages. Extensions are not skippable, if defined in range [0- 127] and skippable, if defined in range [128-255]. This document reserves extension types in both the skippable and non-skippable range for experimental use.
